Articles.Content: In many of the mods i download there r folders labled "Source", "PluginData", etc and i hav NO IDEA wat to do with them or their contents. Any help or advice here would b greatly appreciated.

The Source folder contains the code files from which plugin DLLs are compiled. Since a plugin could do serious damage to your computer, we've required authors to include the source so people can check exactly what that DLL does for peace of mind. You do not need this folder.

The PluginData folder is where plugins are supposed to store their data and configuration files. This folder should be placed in the main KSP folder next to the Plugins folder.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
